name: Demon's Dice
description:
w̴̮͐e̸͓͆ ̵͍̓w̸̧̅ĩ̶̥l̵̬͑l̷̖̕ ̸͓̾p̵̭͝l̷̹͝a̸̮̽ỵ̷́ ̷͍̒a̵̬͊ ̴̛̖g̴̗̿a̷̦͐m̸̫͋é̶̝,̶͝ͅ ̴̦̎l̶̏͜i̷̢̿t̴̼͂t̴̟̓l̵̪̑e̵͈̐ ̸͚̆m̸͇̔å̸̞n̸̥̒.̴̩͆.̴͈̉.̸͈̈́

The Beast Eternal has chosen you to play.

Learn the secrets of it's cosmic chance cube to tip the odds in your favour. Better keep rolling the dice before it gets bored of you, and don't roll a double.

Can you survive long enough to be spared, or will you become the newest addition to it's grotesque collection of creatures?

CREATED BY:

Steven - Programming, project management

Luxon - Music and sound design

JuicyBoot - Artwork and animation
